channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Dot struggles to accept Iono?s plan to livestream their upcoming Tera training battle.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: The Real Mutants assemble, people are drinking vomit and electrocuting themselves for science, and the earth and moon have an earworm about the solar system.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pickle Storm
channel.desc: Pickle wants to win first prize at her school's sports day. However, she gets paired with Roland, who refuses to take part, and her magic accidentally makes him super strong.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Game on Grandparents
channel.desc: It?s time to get messy with Splatoon! Guided by pro-gamer Yammy, the teams face off in an ink-filled showdown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Max and Harvey host the Queasy Spa quiz, where the bros face some nauseating treatments! And can they pilot their own water jet packs in the Ultimate Memory Test.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: It's the Go Jetters as you've never seen them before as they take part in a disco-dazzling around the world gameshow! Foz and Xui are on Team Go Jetter and Grandmaster Glitch and Kyan are on Team Glitch as they go head to head to see who will win. Ubercorn and Lars are the quizmasters asking the questions in this ultimate geographic quiz.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Rex is missing, but Dad, Cosima and Big Lizard need him to save them from a giant slug.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: After Shellington crashes the Gup-D, he and Kwazii team up with a moray eel and grouper fish to pick up the pieces.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: A sales rep visits. Despite Pancake?s doubts, he convinces the Piris to buy extra flippers. The penguins discover that their purchases are duds but find a clever new use for them.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Evil Pea tricks Supertato and the Veggies, who fall into the deli counter and come face to face with the Turnip of Terror. They escape with help from the not-so-scary Turnip.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When Jeopardy Mouse wins the Agent of the Month competition, Danger Mouse and Penfold are forced to travel to New York for a lesson and to take on the criminal organisation known as Hydrant.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Torn between practising Blamjitsu with the yeti and helping the Dinmakers write a new school song, JJ tries to combine the two by bringing the yeti along to band practice disguised as a very hairy roadie.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: The gang enter Pieface into a comedy contest to make him realise how brilliantly funny he is. Determined to win the crown, Walter uses the latest WilburCorp gadget on the unsuspecting audience to sway the vote.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes are relieved that the loud, threatening voice they can hear actually belongs to a small slug named Zorgoth, who is armed with a megaphone. However, when Zorgoth uses his Orb of Compression to shrink the heroes down to the size of ants, their relief evaporates. They must now embark on a long and dangerous quest, through their picnic items and beyond, to warn the Council before Zorgoth shrinks the entire forest.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: Keen to join a race with her classmates, a cavegirl orders a tame T-rex from the Ninjas. But they must work together with her teacher to train the unruly dinosaur.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dumping Ground
channel.desc: Tee gets a taste of what life outside care might be like when she goes for her first college interview. But sparks fly between her and Carmen when neither of their days go according to plan.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Alex Scott joins Rattus for a sport-themed special. Mary Queen of Scots goes grief-golfing, the H2 Freestylers take on a whole village, and sports-mad Henry VIII sings Get Sweaty.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: Big Brain has a chemical catastrophe, Sir Isaac Newton rides a coaster again, with shocking results, Loofah is after a murderer, and Dr Henry VIII on call.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Walter?s pampered cat Clawdia persuades her way into the gang, and only Gnasher can tell that she has a hidden agenda to oust him from Dennis?s life forever.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse and Penfold receive a crash course in the customs of America's oldest holiday when they cover for Jeopardy Mouse as she takes time off for Thanksgiving. After barely escaping from the war zone of a Black Friday sale, they find themselves back at Jeopardy's apartment. DM prepares to tuck into the plentiful Thanksgiving spread when Hissteria and Ham Hands rise out of the dishes. They announce their newly formed coalition and joint plans to vanquish America. DM sticks to his stand-in duties and refuses Jeopardy's help as he and Penfold follow Hissteria and Ham Hands' trail. They find the villainous pair hijacking the Thanksgiving Day parade - launching a gas attack from the air that will turn everything in sight to stuffing. With holiday-saving solutions at a premium, Penfold convinces a reluctant DM to call Jeopardy for help. Jeopardy assures DM that doing things with friends is what Thanksgiving is all about as they set about taking Ham Hands and Hissteria down. They distract them long enough to cut them loose along with the rest of the gas-filled balloons.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: A Perfumer asks the Ninjas to help him create a new and original scent for the Queen by finding the rarest flower in the world.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy decides to adopt a coconut.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When Lady Burlington's precious jewels are stolen, the kids believe that Cat was the unwitting thief and didn't know that she was stealing. They try to put things right by returning the valuables and teaching Cat the error of her ways. However, with Lady Burlington?s security guard searching for the burglar, the kids find their task way trickier than anticipated.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Only wood elves have ever defeated the mighty Eye of Vernon hat, so when the Riddlemaster wears the eye to take over the forest, the heroes quest to Wood Elf Wood to get help. However, Twinkle really doesn?t want to, as wood elves are so stuck up! Struggling to contain her irritation with their high-and-mighty ways, Twinkle still manages to offend them, and the heroes wonder how they will ever save the forest now.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit is accidentally locked out of their van.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit returns to the Museum of Natural Odd to battle a stone warrior.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Duncan tricks Beth into believing she broke his battery-powered bike.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Truth.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Back on the Brave Olivine, Liko, Roy and Dot receive an unexpected challenge to battle.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: Dr Big Brain has an electrical short circuit, Marie Curie is wowed by a rocket man, some of the great women of science are celebrated, and 200 monks get electrocuted.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio as they attempt to win the regional dance championships. Riley tries to make amends with her sister, but it doesn't go exactly as planned. Eldon struggles with the feelings he has for both Michelle and Emily.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: OOglies
channel.desc: The OOglies slip, slide and splat all over the place. This fast-paced, madcap stop-motion animation uncovers the mischief everyday household objects get up to when no-one is looking. Superhero Slippy Nana sort of saves a peach from a terrifying ordeal, Count Grape-ula strikes an unsuspecting victim, the maki and iso ambush a suspicious nigiri in a ninja sushi attack, deep in the back of the mouldy fridge, Frankfurter's monster comes to life, and the conjoined cherries attempt to start a band in the talent show.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: While proudly testing his new doorbell camera, the Farmer realises he has locked himself out. Bitzer must help his boss get back into the farmhouse while simultaneously making sure he doesn?t spot Timmy and Shaun with a runaway kite.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When the Baron speeds up the rotation of Earth using windmills, Danger Mouse and Penfold age 300 years and must take on their nemesis as very, very, very old men.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Paul the Potato is love-struck by the poster girl potato advertising WilburCorp?s new line of super-posh chips. The gang stage a daring potato rescue in the WilburCorp factory.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: The kids are horrified to discover that their favourite spot, Paradise Grove, has been polluted by the Bobblehead Factory.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are victims of inexplicable thefts.

channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings use a frog with hypnotising powers.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. Special agents from the Big O's office threaten to shut down Odd Squad.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The Witch, who was trapped in a Merhaven clam shell while pinching a pearl, grants Blossom a single wish to thank her for releasing her and saving her life. Blossom excitedly chooses a mermaid?s tail to improve her swimming. However, when the Merqueen complains that her pearl is missing, and the heroes have to quest to get it back, Blossom soon realises how tricky a mermaid?s tail can become on land.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Wallace & Gromit: Vengeance Most Fowl
channel.desc: Wallace invents a 'smart gnome' that has a mind of its own - or does it? It falls to Gromit to take on the dastardly Feathers McGraw once more... or Wallace may never invent again.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Trevor is extremely proud of being the clever one in the gang and thinks that his smart mouth is his superpower. However, his friends feel that sometimes his jokes go too far - and they are right to be concerned! When Mr Friendlyface sends the heroes on a quest to prevent Toothgrinder the Ogre from messing up the village green, it?s Trevor?s smart mouth that puts all the heroes in danger.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Alix?s brother - aka Pharaoh.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Dot creates a plan for her Tera training aptitude test against Iono - but will it work.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: Rapping science teacher Matt Green becomes the first human being ever to visit Quark when he joins Pipette on her home planet to help host this special episode about Earth and space.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pickle Storm
channel.desc: Swumpy sneaks into school, and Pickle accidentally makes him super clever so that she comes top in her test! This backfires when she has to represent the school in a maths competition.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Game on Grandparents
channel.desc: Guided by pro-gamer Jelly, the teams gear up for an exhilarating race in Mario Kart. Who will master the art of power-ups and cross the finish line first.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Adam and Joe are joined by their dogs to help them in the kitchen! What could go wrong? The fluffy sous chefs get to work on baking Callum?s dog Bailey a doggy treat.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: The Go Jetters have travelled to Horsetail Fall in the Yosemite National Park. It's a 300m-high waterfall made of melted snow. Once a year the setting sun lights up the water, making it glow like fire for just a few special minutes. This is called Firefall, and if there isn't enough water from the melting snow, Firefall doesn't happen. Unfortunately, Grandmaster Glitch has built a snow princess at the top of the fall and is using an ice machine to stop her melting. When the Go Jetters arrive to watch Firefall, they see that there is no water falling down! Can the team save snowy Princess Glorinda and Firefall.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: When Dad's Lizard Translator malfunctions, Cosima is carried away by a giant beetle! Cosima and Big Lizard realise they don't need to speak the same language to be best friends.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: While diving down to the Midnight Zone, the Octonauts are attacked by bomber worms, and are enlisted to rescue an injured member of their troop.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: Nugget?s new fitness device sparks a craze on the berg. Running, skating and jumping, the Piris battle it out to score the most points, with a surprise winner.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Supertato?s dancing is too powerful and destructive, but when he has to face Evil Pea in a dance-off to save his trapped friends, he soon realises his moves can save the day.

channel.title: Danger Mouse

channel.desc: Walter?s pampered cat Clawdia persuades her way into the gang, and only Gnasher can tell that she has a hidden agenda to oust him from Dennis?s life forever.

channel.desc: Doctor Pfooflepfeffer?s first act as head of governors is to turn Bash Street School into a boarding school. However, the pupils devise a series of daring attempts to escape.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When the heroes quest to stop Balthazar from turning forest folk into household objects, Herbert realises that he can defeat the wizard?s spell by using the magic tricks he has practiced. Blossom is particularly intrigued by Herbert the Peculiar?s tricks, not to mention his stage name, so when Herbert himself is transformed into a table lamp, it?s Blossom the Very Impressive to the rescue.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: A girl orders a beatboxing teacher after seeing a professional beatboxer in the park. However, the Ninjas must first figure out what beatboxing is.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dumping Ground
channel.desc: Unsure of where she fits in, Sasha's glad when an old friend seems to show an interest in her. But does he really have her best interests at heart.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: In honour of Father?s Day, Horrible Histories takes a look at some of history?s daftest dads, featuring Henry VIII, Charles Dickens, William the Conqueror and Joseph Stalin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: A special guide to working scientifically, whether that involves drinking black vomit, measuring people?s farts, or firing arrows into their bum.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis was up most of the night and can barely stay awake. Gnasher and the gang work hard to help steer dozing Dennis through the day, when all he wants to do is continue to dream about battling Zombie-Spiders.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: When a genie gives the Ninjas three wishes in exchange for payment of his order, they each wish to swap roles. However, they quickly realise that they preferred it just the way it was.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.desc: Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle so that the Lemmings have to take care of him.

channel.desc: The kids are asked to watch their neighbour's pet hamster and are given strict instructions not to let it out of its cage. However, Mouse doesn't believe any animal should live in a cage.

channel.desc: The heroes have found the Wishing Trident, which will help them on their quest to prevent the summoning of the legendary two-headed dragon, Iceburn. The problem is, Blossom has used one wish by mistake, and Herbert has accidentally used a second one. Now the heroes are left to defeat the dragon using only one wish, a never-ending ice cream cone (with sprinkles) and a giant spicy sausage hat.
